Ferguson,163 U.S. 537 (1896), questioned the
constitutionality of a law requiring racial segregation in railroad cars.
Opponents of the law gave the following reductio argument. How could
defenders of segregation respond to this argument? Is their response
adequate? Is any response adequate? Why or why not?
